name: AbyssOrangeMix Realistic
description:
AbyssOrangeMix is one of the most downloaded models on CivitAI. This model preserves AOM3A3's structure, composition and colors, but replace the drawing style with some realism. It isn't perfectly photorealistic, the goal was to preserve composition.

Use your favourite prompts from any anime model with an output more 'realistic' and not 'drawn'. It uses 100% of the original text encoder and almost 100% on the input side of AOM3A3. In the sample images, the top row is this model, the bottom row is AOM3A3. The sample images don't require any control net, embeddings, loras or upscaling, no fancy negative prompt. They all use clip skip 2.

This model won't generate big heads, colored eyes with a blank stare, missing noses, excessive blushing, or stylised little mouths. The variety of non-cherry picked sample images should help you judge if it will be useful for your own art.


It took many iterations and merges of a variety of SD 1.5 based models to create this, but it isn't perfect. Mixing is easy if you want a strong mix, but it's really challenging to maintain structure, composition and colors of a model but also create realism rather than drawing. To speed up the process I used:

https://github.com/ashen-sensored/sd-webui-runtime-block-merge

You can use this model in a recipe to make any other model more realistic, by using add difference, put your model in A, this model in B and AOM3A3 in C.

Any negative prompt works. The samples use words, but easynegative is particularly good.

(EasyNegative:1.4), monochrome, blackandwhite, grayscale

I recommend DPE SDE++ and 12 steps when experimenting.

Boost the photorealistic effect with:
((8k uhd, full resolution, detailed skin, film grain, sharp focus, raw, bokeh, f/1.2))

Boost detail with:

((masterpiece)), best quality, ultra-detailed, intricate details, tone mapping, sharp focus, hyper detailed, high res, volumetric lighting

Some of the mixed in models have noise offset, but this lora will improve contrast:
https://civitai.com/models/13941?modelVersionId=16576

This lora will improve detail:

https://civitai.com/models/58390/detail-tweaker-lora-lora


The prompts for all the sample images were generated by ChatGPT based on a prompt used on Abyss Orange Mix samples.
